text: Paul Verhoeven (born 18 July 1938) is a Dutch movie director, producer and writer. He was born in Amsterdam. He directed American movies RoboCop, Total Recall, Basic Instinct, Showgirls and Starship Troopers. He wrote and directed Dutch movie Black Book. During his youth Verhoeven was for a short time a Pentecostal Christian. Although he is an atheist, Black Book he takes a great interest in Jesus. He is a member of the Jesus Seminar and wrote "Jesus of Nazareth" in 2007, a liberal view on Jesus. He is intending to make a movie about Jesus. Many of his movies are provocative, and were controversial when they were released.In his movies, Verhoeven is often criticizing social norms. He does this either by intentionally breaking taboos, or by including social satire.
